SEARCH:
Package game

Klasse Card

java.lang.Object
game.Card
public class Card extends Object
Represents a playing card. Each card has a identifier, suit, and image path.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Card(int id)
    Constructs a new Card instance with the specified identifier.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Card

      public Card(int id) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a new Card instance with the specified identifier.
      Parameter:
      id - The identifier of the card.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided identifier is outside the valid range [1, 52].

  • Methodendetails

    • isHeart

      public boolean isHeart()
      Checks if the card belongs to the Hearts suit. A card is considered a Hearts suit card if its id is within the range [14, 26].
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the card is of Hearts suit, false otherwise.

    • isQueenOfSpades

      public boolean isQueenOfSpades()
      Checks if the card is the Queen of Spades. A card is considered the Queen of Spades if its id is 37.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the card is the Queen of Spades, false otherwise.

    • sameSuit

      public boolean sameSuit(Card otherCard)
      Checks if the current card has the same suit as another card.
      Parameter:
      otherCard - The other card to compare the suit against.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if both cards have the same suit, false otherwise.

    • isHigherAs

      public boolean isHigherAs(Card firstCard)
      Checks whether the current card beats the other card in a trick. A card beats another if it is either the first card played or a higher card of the same suit.
      Parameter:
      firstCard - The other card to compare against.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the current card beats the other card, false otherwise.

    • getHigherCard

      public Card getHigherCard(Card firstCard)
      Returns the higher of two cards, considering the suit.
      Parameter:
      firstCard - The card that determines the winning suit.
      Gibt zurück:
      The higher card between the current card and the specified card.

    • getCardName

      public String getCardName()
      Returns the name of the card based on its encoding. Useful, for example, for testing whether a deck has been successfully created.
      Gibt zurück:
      The name of the card, including its suit and rank.

    • getImagePath

      public String getImagePath()
      Gets the file path to the image associated with the card.
      Gibt zurück:
      The file path to the image of the card.

    • getSuit

      public Suits getSuit()
      Gets the suit of the card.
      Gibt zurück:
      The suit of the card.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the id of the card. Value Range [1, 52]
      Gibt zurück:
      The identifier of the card, which is representing a combination of the card's suit and rank.

    • getImagePathOfBacksideCard

      public static String getImagePathOfBacksideCard()
      Gets the file path to the image of the backside of a card.
      Gibt zurück:
      The file path to the image of the backside of a card.

    • getSuitIndex

      public int getSuitIndex() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Gets the index of the card's suit.
      Gibt zurück:
      The index of the card's suit (0 for Diamonds, 1 for Hearts, 2 for Spades, 3 for Clubs).
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the card has an unknown suit.
